{"id":721890288,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1655192028,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/721890288/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"9.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        \n        if(word1.length()==0)\n            return word2.length();\n        if(word2.length()==0)\n            return word1.length();\n        int l1=word1.length();\n        int l2=word2.length();\n        vector<vector<int>>dp(l1+1,vector<int>(l2+1));\n        for(int i=0;i<l1+1;i++)\n            dp[i][0]=i;\n        for(int j=0;j<l2+1;j++)\n            dp[0][j]=j;\n        for(int i=1;i<=l1;i++)\n        {\n            for(int j=1;j<=l2;j++)\n            {\n                if(word1[i-1]==word2[j-1])\n                    dp[i][j]=dp[i-1][j-1];\n                else\n                {\n                    dp[i][j]=min(min(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]),dp[i-1][j-1])+1;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[l1][l2];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
